title: Saoirse Ronan
summary: Saoirse Una Ronan (/ˈsɜːrʃə ˈuːnə ˈroʊnən/ SUR-shə OO-nə ROH-nən;[1][lower-alpha 1] born 12 April 1994) is an American-born[lower-alpha 2] Irish actress. Primarily noted for her roles in period dramas since adolescence,[2] Ronan has received various accolades throughout her career, including a Golden Globe Award and a Critics' Choice Movie Award, in addition to nominations for four Academy Awards, four Screen Actors Guild Awards, and five British Academy Film Awards.
